content: **crocheted dress in drops muskat the piece is worked top down with lace pattern sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-819 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 600-650-750-800-900-950 g colour 09 nutmeg **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
